name: Optic: Puzzle game
description:
Spatial puzzle based on optical phenomena.
Use the reflection properties of light to direct it in the right direction. With the help of dispersion, it is possible to obtain light rays of different colors that need to be directed in the right direction, and with the help of water the light is refracted and passes along a different trajectory.
Using ray tracing technology, reflections and glare achieve maximum realism and allow you to get the most out of the game!
